001package com.telos.loops.transactional;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnoreProperties;
004import java.util.List;
005
006/**
007 * Represents a transactional email template in Loops.
008 *
009 * <p>Transactional emails are one-off emails sent in response to user actions (e.g., password
010 * reset, order confirmation). Each template is identified by an ID and can accept dynamic data
011 * variables.
012 *
013 * @param id the unique identifier for this transactional email template
014 * @param name the display name of the transactional email
015 * @param lastUpdated the timestamp when this template was last modified
016 * @param dataVariables list of variable names that can be used in this template (e.g.,
017 *     "resetLink", "orderNumber")
018 */
019@JsonIgnoreProperties(ignoreUnknown = false)
020public record TransactionalEmail(
021    String id, String name, String lastUpdated, List<String> dataVariables) {}
